meanings.def: pieces of writing that are valued as works of art, especially novels, plays and poems (in contrast to technical books and newspapers, magazines, etc.)
examples: For most people, the desire to study literature begins with a love of reading.

meanings.def: pieces of writing or printed information on a particular subject
examples: literature on something a review of the scientific literature on the topic
I've read all the available literature on keeping rabbits.
literature about something I picked up some literature about pensions.
Chapter 1 reviews the literature and discusses the main types of sources available.
